inclusion.criterion: Positive qualitative hepatitis C RNA polymerase chain reaction assay on two occasions
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Renal failure [estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR) < 30 cc/min]
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Model or End stage Liver Disease (MELD) score > 20
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection and is on combination therapy with IFN and RBV. Recent biopsy was negative for hepatocellular carcinoma.
